text.content:
Backswing

You deal the attack's normal damage to yourself instead of the target.

Melee

Wide Open

You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} until the end of your next turn.

Ranged

Tripped

You fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Prone]{Prone}.

Unarmed

Tangled in your Gear

You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Encumbered]{Encumbered} until you spend 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Interact]{Interact} actions to free your self.

Spell
